attributes.additional_details:
All public Sector strikers should lose their pension schemes and receive basic state pensions only.
Current  levels are more than generous and if public sector workers are not happy they should get a job in the real world, there are plenty more people looking for work who could only dream about levels of pay and pensions currently given in the public sector.
At £32 billion a year this is already an enormous financial drain.
The private sector cannot go on supporting this, or the country will be an even bigger mess.
